description:
Understand Federal Income Taxes for Individual Tax Payers is a course designed to help everyday taxpayers understand the tax forms, schedules, and returns they receive from their tax preparer. This course will walk you section-by-section and sometimes line-by-line so you understand the returns. This is a basic course in federal income tax.

This course is primarily taught using video with downloadable lecture slides. There is a quiz after each section of the course to help reinforce the materials in the videos.

You will want to take this course if you want to get a greater understanding of your tax returns, the tax law, and nuances that you might have not known. This course is also a great opportunity to prospective, current, and former tax preparers who want to get a refresher of the most common tax forms and schedules.

At the end of this course you should be able to read your tax return and ask the right questions to your tax preparer regarding questionable parts of your tax returns.

This is a very basic, entry level course.
title: Understanding Federal Income Taxes for Individual Taxpayers
